system.description:
Choose a Spellschool.

Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.UDNR29IgRZEHsxEz]{Magical Apprentice(Chosen Spellschool)}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.QP3umHqNoPgfTImu]{Magical Journeyman (Chosen Spellschool)}, and Spellschool (Chosen Spellschool) 12 ranks

Benefits

When scribing spells in the chosen spellschool, the SP cost is 5 less

Special

This feat stacks with any other spell cost reduction feats. This feat can be taken multiple times. Each time it is taken, it applies to a different spellschool.
